tool_description: Search addresses and corresponding locations by free-form address string. The API returns the standardized address and individual address components, latitude & longitude coordinates, and other helpful information.
name: Geoapify Forward Geocoding
title: Geoapify Forward Geocoding

api_list.name: geocoding
api_list.description: Geoapify provides Geocoding API that searches addresses worldwide. The API works via HTTP GET API. So it's cross-platform and can be used with most of the programming languages.

optional_parameters.name: bias
optional_parameters.description:
Prefer places by country, boundary, circle, location:
* By circle - circle:lon,lat,radiusMeters - bias=circle:-87.770231,41.878968,5000
* By rectangle - rect:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2 - bias=rect:-89.097540,39.668983,-88.399274,40.383412
* By country - Comma-separated ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country codes (in lower case). Use 'auto' to detect the country by IP address. Use 'none' to skip (default value). - bias=countrycode:de,es,fr
* By location - proximity:lon,lat - bias=proximity:41.2257145,52.971411

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description:
Filter places by country, boundary, circle:
* By circle - circle:lon,lat,radiusMeters -  filter=circle:-87.770231,41.878968,5000
* By rectangle - rect:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2 - 	filter=rect:-89.097540,39.668983,-88.399274,40.383412
* By country  - comma-separated ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country codes (in lower case). Use 'auto' to detect the country by IP address. Use 'none' to skip (default value). - filter=countrycode:de,es,fr

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Result language. 2-character ISO 639-1 language codes are supported.
